name: Adam Culp
text: Good food. Friendly staff.

name: Matt Miller
text: I don't write too many reviews but after two trips here and two orders like this I can't help myself. This is supposed to be a pepperoni pizza but it has NO pepperoni and bare spots of just crust! Worst pizza I have ever had and it isn't even close. Will never be back!

name: MrBubbles4U
text: This place literally refused to deliver my order, contact me, and stole my money upon refund. Management is terrible and should be avoided

name: Michale Russell
text: I wouldn't give this establishment not 1 star but in order to post my review I have to. Horrible customer service. I placed a carry out order for me an my kids picked up the order went home an opened the box an it wasn't what I asked for I …More

name: Dylan Baldwin
text: At the moment  you enter that restaurant  the stuff gives you an excellent feeling. Very congenial stuff, it is a happy place to go out with your friends or with your date. heavenly  meals, creative  chef, reasonable  price and courteous  service. Highly recommended.

name: Raymond Burt III
text: Waited 2 hours for my food, only to find out they canceled my order. I made this order online. Would not recommend if you actually want to eat

name: Jordan Kouba
text: I am visiting in town on vacation for my birthday ordered pizza for our last night Order the pizza I got the price sitting here waiting and got a phone call saying that the cook went to the hospital and we cannot receive our pizza this is …More

name: Robert Burch
text: Told me 35 minutes for my carry out order, took an hour.  Worst pizza hut in DSM.  Will never be back.

name: Tyler Vandewater
text: Ordered pizza from here. Waited an hour and a half for it before calling to see where it was at and was told it was voided but the employee didnt know why. The phone was given to a different employee who didnt know why I was calling and was told they ran out of EVERYTHING  and cancelled all the orders but didnt call to tell anyone that.

name: Josefina Rosas
text: Ordered some food, pretty late, never arrived, I’m done with ordering from here

name: rene mullaney
text: Phoned in my order for carry out. When I got there, was told that they had no record of my order. Was told that if they don’t answer after so many rings, the call goes to a call center, and sometimes the order goes to the Ashworth store. …More

name: Toigi B
text: Took to long said 35 minutes took an hour 15 minutes. Just slow staff back there playing. No excuse. Ask for extra sauce on the boneless wigs they were dry. Oh no. Never again

name: Robert Jessup
text: Waited an hour for delivery called guy said he was going to take $8 off my order still got charged full price and waited another 30 minutes for delivery and the food was cold when it showed up

name: Ninja JesusX
text: Ordered a pizza for delivery tonight and they forgot the marinara sauce, was on the phone with them for over 10 minutes, the dude taking my order sounded fried out of his mind kept on having me repeat my address and didn’t even ask cash or …More

name: Taylor Mills
text: Ordered pizza and wings. Pizza was great but the wings were complete opposite of what I ordered. Wanted boneless and got traditional, wanted honey bbq and got something extremely hot/spicy. Not happy with that. However they delivered fast and delivery man was very nice.

name: Arnes Bahtagic
text: I ordered the family box with wings never got the wings in the box called the store stated will have made and re delivered but it’s been over an hour and no one is arrived will never order Pizza Hut again amazingly horrible

name: BeastBestPuma
text: Great place and service! Pretty decent delivery drivers as well.

name: Richard Cross
text: Excellent pizza. Ours was.

name: Adam Barnes
text: Dude I called an hour before they closed and requested a meat lovers with stuffed crust and they stated that they do not have any stuffed crust. Do the managers know about this?

name: Dutch Doctor
text: Decent ok tasting pizza

name: Ronald Price
text: It had been a long time since we had pizza hut but we decided to give them another shot. We did the $5 deal and got 2 medium one topping pizzas and some breadsticks and mini cinnamon rolls. I was actually suprised by the taste and freshness …More

name: Lord Duke
text: Regularly forget to put cheese packets in for delivery. They did not include part of my last order. When I called, they said they were going to resend what they forgot. The delivery guy calls about 2 minutes out saying he has my cheese …More

name: Jeremy Glenn
text: Friendly, positive, courteous staff....pizza tasted delicious and staff assisted me with best deal I couldn't believe it. Thank you

name: Jamie Gerth
text: I have lived just blocks from this Pizza Hut for 8 years now and it's the only Pizza Hut delivery option I have. I no longer even try anymore. They consistently get the order wrong, take hours to deliver and some times don't deliver at all. …More

name: Marco Solano
text: $5dls pizza that cheapest and the best

name: Santu Reddy
text: I have ordered thru online two Chicken medium- sized pizzas. I have selected Chicken and two veggie toppings, but unfortunately they have added pork on to it, besides of chicken. It really annoyed me and could not enjoy eating the pizza. I …More

name: Christopher Erickson
text: I have to agree with most of the other reviews of this Pizza Hut, it sucks. My takeout order was wrong when I came to pick it up. They realized this, remade another pizza and messed it up again the second time around. Not only that, I was …More

name: Mase Daniel
text: Gr8 food. Nothing like diabetes at the age of 20.

name: Aaron Price
text: We ordered pizza for dinner at 9 and were given a 10:35 delivery estimate. I got notified the driver was out at 10:30. At 11 I called the store to see where the driver was. I was told he delivered the wrong order and would be right out with ours at a discount. It's after midnight and we never got our food.

name: Judi Burgess
text: I get delivery from this Pizza Hut pretty regularly for lunch. I get the personal pan pizza and cheesy break sticks; both are delicious. I always get good service and hot food. Calling again today.

name: Grant Jansen
text: Super fast service and I have ordered from here a lot.  Great pizza, never a bad one.  Love Pizza Hut.

name: Ashley Berg
text: Oh well to be honest after reading the reviews I thought this place would not be good enough to order food but I decided to go ahead and order anyways.. Took 45 mins to get my pizza and cheese bread ( which tasted amazing and the delivery guy was super nice.

name: Sean Scott
text:
This location is solid. Pizza is always delivered in a timely fashion, never had a mistake with my orders. And Richard is one of the coolest guys this side of the Mississippi.
Domino's got nothin on these guys.

name: J.T. N
text: AMAZING wings

name: T3- 812
text: I used to order from this location faithfully and tip $5 everytime i ordered but recently this location has kicked the bucket. Im not sure if its the management or the employees but ive never experienced a back to back disappointing …More

name: Craig Esch
text: Old Favorite!

name: Zachary Hayes
text: I wouldn't usually complain about this kind of mistake if they meant well, but she was RUDE on top of calling me "ma'am". If you're using the phone and don't have an ounce of common sense then you shouldn't be using pronouns, that's good customer service 101--but minimum wage = minimum effort.

name: Arvind Anand
text: Decent place... stuffed crust pizza.. not so good...

name: Josh Ford
text: Decent pizza, decent prices

name: Tiffany Ha
text: Staffs are super nice and we are always happy with the pizza we ordered

name: alma zilic
text: Horrible. Ordered two pizzas and parmesan breadsticks. One pizza was ok, second one was not cooked through. You could feel the gooey dough thats undercooked and makes me wanna throw up. Threw a whole pizza in the trash can. The parmesan …More

name: Brain Fisher
text: Terrible Pizza...Like eating grease soaked, heavily sugar coated foam. Pizza Hut is in trouble...We drove by Saturday at noon and there were 2 cars in the lot, probably employees. Up the street, Long Jonhs and A&W had lines inside and out, …More

name: troy campbell
text: Good pizza

name: dylan hill
text: I have to agree with the other reviews this place in fact sucks balls . I ordered a pasta that the noodles were only half way covered in cheese. waste of time & money

name: Colleen Smith
text: Order is always wrong and the toppings slide right off the pizza

name: rita lans
text: Worse pizza I have had in a long time.  It has been a long time since i had a Pizza Hut pizza and it will be my last from the Grand Ave location. When I called to complain about my half baked pizza the person on the phone could not even sound caring or concerned about my concerns.

text: Great pizza

text: Terrible service. My pizza was supposed to be at my house almost an hour ago and it just got here, it's cold and the cheese is all over the top of my box. DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM

text: Fantastic

text: Just so we're clear, the only reason I'm gave 1 star is because -500 isn't an option.

name: Vicki Schipul
text: Just ordered a taco pizza from the Grand Avenue location. Inedible. Giant chunks of onion and lettuce with tiny bit of cheese and tomato. No tortillas. Will never order from Pizza Hut again!
